thread.title: Ex-Baylor coach Art Briles drops libel lawsuit against school officials
thread.title_full: Ex-Baylor coach Art Briles drops libel lawsuit against school officials

author: Sarah Mervosh
title: Ex-Baylor coach Art Briles drops libel lawsuit against school officials
text:
Get Unlimited Digital Access Your first month is less than a dollar. $0.99 for first 4 weeks Subscribe Now 
Former Baylor football coach Art Briles, who dug the program out of mediocrity to make Baylor a regular bowl game contender but was fired last year amid a campus-wide sexual assault scandal that began with the football team, dropped his libel lawsuit against school officials Wednesday. 
Briles' lawyer gave notice to opposing counsel Wednesday morning, and the suit was later dropped during a brief court hearing in Llano County, said attorney Rusty Hardin, who represents three Baylor regents named in the suit. 
Hardin and attorney Katherine Mackillop, who represents another top university official, declined to comment. 
Briles' attorney, Ernest Cannon, did not respond to multiple requests for comment Wednesday. View Comments
